introduction.p: This control template is for <TreeView/> and <BindableTreeView/>.

prop.name: ExpandingDecoratorTemplate
prop.p: This property defines the control template for the selectable button, which controls the Expanding property of an item.
If this property is empty, the default control template for the TreeItemExpander theme will be used.

prop.name: TextColor
prop.p: This property defines the default color for the item text. The value will be copied to the TextColor property of all <TreeItemTemplate/> in the list control.
